explanation: Skeletons are all bones and no bravery—gutless wonders!
Fake spaghetti deserves a sneaky name like impasta—don’t trust it on your plate!
Eggs can’t handle the pressure of comedy—they’d break under the spotlight!
Vampires love a juicy blood orange—it’s practically a snack with a bite!
The tomato blushed when it caught the salad dressing in action—talk about a saucy moment!
